about.title: About Us
about.content:
TechNova Solutions has been a leader in delivering innovative IT services since 2012. With over 20 years of combined expertise, we specialize in empowering businesses worldwide to achieve digital transformation through cutting-edge technology solutions.
Our team of 150+ certified professionals excels in custom software development, cloud infrastructure & migration, AI & machine learning, and cybersecurity. As a proud Microsoft Gold Partner and AWS Consulting Partner, we ensure enterprise-grade quality and compliance for all our clients.
We are committed to delivering scalable, secure, and tailored IT solutions that drive business growth and operational excellence. With a 95% client retention rate and 24/7 technical support, TechNova is your trusted partner in navigating the future of technology.
